item.title: Mob chased Brooklyn woman after mistaking her for protester at speech by Israeli security minister
item.description: A New York City woman says she feared for her life as she was chased, kicked and pelted with objects by a mob of men who mistook her as a participant in a protest against Israelâ€™s far-right security minister.

item.title: Former Memphis officers to face second trial in beating death of Tyre Nichols
What to know about the trial of an ex-Michigan cop charged in the killing of a Black motorist
